name: Slime Climber
description:
In this game you will find a journey of not only, joy, but also failure, frustration and determination. Using your mouse, do your best to aim, select the power and make the slime jump, higher and higher. A game where the simplest failure can lead to a massive setback.

It's a simple yet deceptively hard game, where your skills in aiming, patience and determination will be tested.

    [*Achievements*All new art for this game*Easy to understand, hard to master*An excellent way to test your patience]
